Title: Worst Experience of my life
Review:
I never write reviews for things. That I love or hate. But this experience was the worst I have had with any company ever.

Customer Service/Support: 

The bird was 10 days late from arrival. I waited everyday and I got lucky that they only pushed it back 10 days late. My roommates weren‚Äôt so lucky. They waited a month to receive a working one. The ones they received previously were all defective.

I locked up their scooter with their technology. I left it parked for less than 24 hours and when I came back it was gone. I had been riding this thing to and from work for weeks and this was the first time I parked it outside. DO NOT PARK THEM OUTSIDE THEY WILL GET STOLEN. (see technology) 

As many of you know, apps collect data all the time, with every button you click there is data being collected. They were not even interested in helping me find the bird. They literally have all the data. They took 8 hours to reply to me after I said it was stolen. Then took 30 minutes from when I gave a statement to charge me $200 for their technology not working. WHAT IS THIS COMPANY TRYING TO PULL!!! Why should we be punished for their technology not working? Also, if they were really interested in getting their scooter back they would have helped me find it. I didn‚Äôt want to get it stolen, I use it everyday and now I have to find another way to get to work. 

Technology: 

It doesn‚Äôt go very fast and it randomly will beep. My coworkers would get so annoyed when I left it by my desk because it would randomly beep. ‚ÄúI hate that thing‚Äù, my desk neighbor. I think they are all defective in some way shape or form. Sometimes it will be able to accelerate and sometimes it won‚Äôt. There is seriously something wrong with their tech. I was only using it to get to work everyday in a straight path for 10 minutes and although I was scared something was going to happen to it I still did it because it was so short. 

They literally have a small thin cord to ‚Äúlock your scooter‚Äù. This is not safe, they are basically asking to get stolen. It seems like this is to sabotage you into getting it stolen and them making $200 off of you. There tech is so bad I wouldn‚Äôt be surprised if they are making a profit off of it. 

Also if your phone dies you are basically screwed. Everything is connected to your phone so it won‚Äôt ride or lock when your phone is dead. I had to drag it for a mile to get home when my phone died. It was beeping and resisting the whole time. 

Conclusion 

This experience has been actually traumatic and I don‚Äôt really have heavy feelings toward a lot of things and that is why I am writing this. I hope I can prevent some people from going through this. Do yourself a favor and avoid this app at all costs. As soon as a better product with better customer service comes around these folks are history. Good luckier to them. I am truly embarrassed I ever rode one of these.
